issue.title: Principal Wilson's Approval Rating
issue.text: Principal Wilson thinks homework is really important. You will find that if you grade your student's homework correctly, your approval rating will go up!

issue.title: Student Respect Score
issue.text: Some of your students can be disrespectful to you and their fellow students. To help them learn to be more respectful, be sure to look at their 'behavior reports' and choose the best way to deal with each situation. You can find these reports in the Student Book in your office.
